channel.title: Gwt on The Culture of Code
channel.description: Recent content in Gwt on The Culture of Code

item.title: GWT is about to add Native JSON function support in version 2.1
item.description: GWT 2.1 has reached Milestone 2. One of the new features in version 2.1 is support for browser’s native JSON function in JSONParser class. Now there are three methods JSONParser which may be used to parse JSON string:
